meanings.sent1: Her misanalysis of the data led to a wrong conclusion.
meanings.sent2: The misanalysis of the experiment results caused confusion.
meanings.sent3: The misanalysis of the recipe made the cake taste strange.
meanings.sent4: His misanalysis of the map led us in the wrong direction.
meanings.sent5: The misanalysis of the painting made it look like a different artwork.

meanings.definition: The act of analyzing something incorrectly.
meanings.sent1: The misanalysis of the situation resulted in a misunderstanding.
meanings.sent2: Her misanalysis of the poem made her misinterpret its meaning.
meanings.sent3: The misanalysis of the weather forecast led to unexpected rain.
meanings.sent4: His misanalysis of the equation caused errors in the calculations.
meanings.sent5: The misanalysis of the evidence led to a flawed conclusion.
